    • Uses of Piece in net.royalur.model

      Classes in net.royalur.model with type parameters of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Board<P extends Piece>
      Stores the placement of pieces on the tiles of a Royal Game of Ur board.
      class  GameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state represents a single point within a game.
      class  Move<P extends Piece>
      A move that can be made on a board.
      Fields in net.royalur.model declared as Piece 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected P Move.capturedPiece
      The piece that will be captured by this move, or null if no piece would be captured by this move.
      protected P Move.fromPiece
      The piece on the board to be moved, or null if a new piece is to be moved onto the board.
      protected P Move.toPiece
      The piece that will be placed at the destination of the move, or null if moving a piece off of the board.
      Methods in net.royalur.model that return Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Piece Piece.of​(Player player)
      Returns a piece with player as its owner.
      Methods in net.royalur.model with parameters of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static char Piece.toChar​(Piece piece)
      Converts piece to a single character that can be used to textually represent the owner of a piece.

    • Uses of Piece in net.royalur.model.state

      Classes in net.royalur.model.state with type parameters of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ActionGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state that is included in the middle of a game to record an action that was taken, but that is not a valid state to be in.
      class  MovedGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state that represents a roll that resulted in no available moves due to a roll with a value of zero.
      class  OngoingGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state that is included while the game is still ongoing.
      class  PlayableGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state where we are waiting for interactions from a player.
      class  RolledGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state that represents a roll that was made in a game.
      class  WaitingForMoveGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state where the game is waiting for a player to make a move.
      class  WaitingForRollGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state where the game is waiting for a player to roll the dice.
      class  WinGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
      A game state where a player has won the game.
